subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: almost too embarassed to post this, but....
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Andy it will fix future ones but for those already sent somone will have to forward u the email attachment. Just let me know what one you want I may still have it in my box

Misty




--- On Wed, 10/29/08, ourobouros2k2 <ourobouros2k2@...> wrote:

> From: ourobouros2k2 <ourobouros2k2@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: almost too embarassed to post this, but....
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Wednesday, October 29, 2008, 3:28 AM
> Thanks Allen, Misty, I shall try that and see if it remedies
> access 
> to those links.
> 
> hope all is well with everyone, again thanks :)
> 
> Andy
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn
> <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
> >
> > Yep Allen is correct, thats the fix. Some posts are
> made via email 
> with attchments and the only way to recieve files that are
> attached 
> to posts is to put your settings on individual email.
> > 
> > Misty
> > 
> > 
> > --- On Tue, 10/28/08, Allen <amuck944@...>
> wrote:
> > 
> > > From: Allen <amuck944@...>
> > > Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: almost too embarassed to
> post this, but....
> > > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> > > Date: Tuesday, October 28, 2008, 3:20 PM
> > > I had the same problem.  I broke down and changed
> my setting
> > > so now I
> > >  get individual emails from the group.  That
> solved the
> > > problem for me.  
> > > 
> > > Allen 
> > > 
> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com,
> "ourobouros2k2"
> > > <ourobouros2k2@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > Ok, when someone posts a non-stored embedded
> soundclip
> > > or video, I
> > > > find it to be non-clickable. I am forced to
> run latest
> > > version of
> > > > firefox, but at work with ie6 I have the
> same issue.
> > > How do I open
> > > > these post attachments? I am sure the answer
> is
> > > painfully obvious, so
> > > > here is a preemptive "d'oh!"
> > > > 
> > > > thanks
> > > > Andy
> > > >
> >
